feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
